title: ‘Uncharted territory’: State weighs major AI overhaul for myAlaska
description: A proposal to add agentic artificial intelligence to the site where Alaskans apply for everything from driver’s licenses to PFDs could put the state at the forefront of using AI for government functions.
content:
The state is considering an overhaul of its myAlaska portal that could suffuse artificial intelligence technology through the ways Alaskans interact with state agencies online.

description: Policy makers have a lot to consider on the president's artificial intelligence project.

title: AI: Friend or Foe for Local News?
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming local journalism by creating efficiencies and enhancing information distribution. Despite the risks and challenges posed by AI, such as declining ad revenues and 'news deserts,' there's potential for AI to support journalism through collaboration and technological advancements without replacing human presence.

title: Japan's Nikkei ends at 3-week low on tech selloff over AI-business outlook
description: Japan's Nikkei share average ended at a three-week low on Thursday, pressured by heavyweight tech stocks as investors weighed the outlook for artificial intelligence and data centre businesses.
content:

title: AI Disruption: The Pervasive Influence Over Journalism
description: The rise of Artificial Intelligence is reshaping industries, particularly journalism. AI-generated content poses challenges in verification, threatening journalism's role in society. The media must adapt with new standards and practices to mitigate AI's impact and preserve trust in information sources.
